data.text:
Come and celebrate holidays with Asiana Airlines at Winter Wonderland at The Source OC!
When: Saturday, December 15, 2018
Time: 5:00PM - 10:00PM
Location: The Source OC
Follow @Asianaairelines 
TAG TWO FRIENDS to win a FREE ticket to Winter Wonderland party at The Source! https://t.co/uSzExK8TkZ

Come and  visit Asiana Airlines'  renovated facilities at our new location at Incheon Airport Terminal 1 🛫
and watch the video of Asiana Airlines Ambassador PSY’s real Asiana experience!… https://t.co/opKSEHMK2q

data.text:
We are excited to invite you to our special Winter Wonderland Year-End party that will take place on Saturday, December 15 on Rooftop Terrace at The Source. 
Let's say our fond farewells… https://t.co/wRH0w4DCmM

Do not miss Cyber Monday deals with Asiana Airlines! 
Last day for up to 4% off for our Business class customers!
.

.

data.text:
Asiana introduces the A350, an advanced aircraft built with next-generation technology.
Equipped with upgraded services, the ASIANA 350 is ready for boarding.
.
.
.
#flywithOZ https://t.co/IX3WdS40Ni

Comment your favorite city in the USA that you wanna introduce people to the whole world! 🌎
#America #With #Asiana ✈️ https://t.co/LMwHKcCJm0

data.text: @Aviationdailyy @iLove_Aviation @vargasmoni @MarkRWheeler2 @AstroHardin @AviateAddict WOW! Love this so much! Thank you for the great shot!
@yourchinaguy Please contact our local reservation to change your date. If you purchased the ticket from travel agent, please contact them directly.
@onewil We apologize for the inconvenience. For reservation inquiry, please email at usreservation@flyasiana.com and for mileage inquiry, email at usasianaclub@flyasiana.com. Thank you.

@mearo07 @flysrilankan Dear Chris, we deeply regret the inconvenience. Please visit our Voice of Customer Contact page via our website at https://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ, our Customer Relations department will contact you back shortly. Thank you.
